title: SCP-1430-KO
content:
[[include info:start]]

**제목:** SCP-1430-KO - 초들은 녹아 없어지기만을 기다리고 있는가

**저자:** [[*user romrom]], [[*user oratio]], [[*user chayusen]]

**작가 페이지:**

> = [/romrom romrom] [/run-night-run oratio] [/chayusen chayusen]

> Would you say that someone who had every intention to be brave was a coward?
> 넌 용감해지려 마음 먹은 이를 겁쟁이라 말할까?
